ygData.subject: Re: A question about Enchant Silver
ygData.msgSnippet: I suggest you make you way to the Commonlands (or zone into Nektulos if you re brave) and /who all Dark Elf.....send a polite request and offer to pay for some
ygData.messageBody:
I suggest you make you way to the Commonlands (or zone into Nektulos
if you're brave) and /who all Dark Elf.....send a polite request and offer
to pay for some assistance.....

I've done this twice....Silver and Electrum spells.....


Good luck

Fistlebane, high elf of The Rathe




From: Christine Greenwald <ChrisRAV4@...> on 08/03/99
06:50 AM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: [eqenchanters] A question about Enchant Silver

From: Christine Greenwald <ChrisRAV4@...>

Hi everyone-

I've been lurking on the list for the last week or so and have found
your
discussions very valuable as a beginning jeweler. Last night I made
level 8
and would like to obtain the Enchant Silver spell. It is my
understanding the
spell is located in the Library in Neriak, a place to which I
haven't been.

My question is: as a high-elf enchanter, am I KOS in Neriak? (I'm
betting
probably so...) If so, what strategies did you use to obtain the
spell? I have
not seen anyone in in Greater Faydark selling the spell on the
Erollisi Marr
server.

Your comments will be most helpful. Thanks!


Christine
known Minbari on Erollisi Marr
